I'm failing to grasp how non divisioned players will be punished. More cooperation on both sides of the field should only serve to make games consistently closer and more tactical for both teams. Does the existence of divisions impede individual player skill? I don't understand.

You're completely batshit applying arbitrary values and influence to arbitrary ideals and spouting it as statistical fact. You have no idea what you're on about. If you're a solo queue player you could be put on the team with good divs or bad just like now where you are on the crap team or good. It's all a wash.
Not if both teams have the same numbers of divisioned players
Individuals would still be able to climb though. It'd be more or less the same experience as it is now for them.
I'd argue that more people would be playing so MM would have a better time of it.
Team battles was a failure no one played. And getting a full group of 7 is harder than a mix of duos and singles.

WRITING.TITLE: Ranked needs to allow divisions
WRITING.TEXT:
As I'm sure many people know, ranked can be a very frustrating experience and most of this comes from the lack teamwork. This is a team based game and when you take this away, I lose the will to play. It's why I couldn't bear the grind this season even while performing moderately well.
MM needs to allow division of 2, imo and it can match so both teams have the same amount of divisions. This will ensure that there is at least some semblance of teamwork guaranteed and you can at least play with friends for the hundreds of ranked battles required for rank 1.

Everyone is always hating on WG but what have they done that was anti consumer? I can't really remember anything.
Edit - all these downvotes and no replies telling me where I'm wrong. It's good to be back.

They still nerfed Shimakaze so they're the devil.
/s
gg wg
I'm not sure how the lack of exp rewards decides what makes a ship strong but you can argue with me just to argue. It's fun.

DDs are good for way more than random torp spreads. You're simplifying their roles too much. Smoking up friendlies, constant long range HE/AP barrage that can't be stopped easily, all while being able to move between caps and chose engagements at will that best suit them. DDs are insane in the membrane my friend.

Atago has less damage potential that Mogami as it has a slower reload.
Kutuzov has the same accuracy as Chap, gets smoke but Chap has excellent radar which is very useful in pubs and better detection.
Tirptiz armor layout works against itself a lot and dies to HE spam faster than anything given its poor deck armor.
People often misinterpret what OP means. Strong ships are not OP. Ships that have little to no counter potential to them are OP, which is why DDs have been nerfed over and over.
